column1: $Malefic Red-Eyes Black Dragon (Updated from: Malefic Red-Eyes B. Dragon)$$DARK$[Dragon/Effect]$$$$$7$2400$2000$$$$Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 "Red-Eyes Black Dragon" from your Deck. There can only be 1 "Malefic" monster on the field. Other monsters you control cannot declare an attack. If there is no face-up Field Spell on the field
